articles.description: Love Island's Molly-Mae Hague has revealed she tried every product to stop her getting stretch marks during her pregnancy but admits they are never going to go
articles.content:
Pregnant Molly-Mae Hague has been praised by fans after candidly showing off her stretch marks on camera.
 The Love Island star revealed her "tiger stripe" stretch marks around her bump during a pre… [+2988 chars]

articles.description: Eamonn Holmes has been off air for four months to recover from an operation

articles.title: Horoscope for January 2023: Four star signs will have 'the best luck and love and money' - Express
articles.description: An astrologer shared their horoscopes for 2023 on TikTok, promising luck for four signs.
